profitTargetCheck.details: Target of 50,000 THB monthly profit achieved in Month 4 (52,800 THB)

marginCheck.details: All pricing tiers exceed 10% minimum margin requirement (actual: 40-45%)

growthRateCheck.details: Month-over-month growth rates are realistic (max 100% in early months, stabilizing later)

fixedOpexCheck.details: Fixed OPEX changes are justified with explanations in assumptions.md

costAssumptionsCheck.details: All cost assumptions are cited with sources in assumptions.md

summary.message: All financial probes passed. Financial model is complete and meets requirements.
recommendations: Consider adding sensitivity analysis for key variables
